CustomField.description: Event Quarter does not match Event Month, or Event Name contains different year than Event Year.
CustomField.formula: OR( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT(Event_Month__c) ) ), NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) ) ), CASE( TEXT(Event_Month__c), "January", IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q1", "1", ""), "February", IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q1", "1", ""), "March", IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q1", "1", ""), "April", IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q2", "1", ""), "May", IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q2", "1", ""), "June", IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q2", "1", ""), "July", IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q3", "1", ""), "August", IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q3", "1", ""), "September", IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q3", "1", ""), "October",IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q4", "1", ""), "November",IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q4", "1", ""), "December",IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q4", "1", ""), "") = "1" ), AND( CONTAINS( Name , "2020"), OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Event_Start_Date__c )), YEAR(Event_Start_Date__c) <> 2020 ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Event_Year__c )), Event_Year__c <> 2020 ) ) ), AND( CONTAINS( Name , "2021"), OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Event_Start_Date__c )), YEAR(Event_Start_Date__c) <> 2021 ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Event_Year__c )), Event_Year__c <> 2021 ) ) ), AND( CONTAINS( Name , "2022"), OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Event_Start_Date__c )), YEAR(Event_Start_Date__c) <> 2022 ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Event_Year__c )), Event_Year__c <> 2022 ) ) ), AND( CONTAINS( Name , "2023"), OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Event_Start_Date__c )), YEAR(Event_Start_Date__c) <> 2023 ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Event_Year__c )), Event_Year__c <> 2023 ) ) ), AND( CONTAINS( Name , "2024"), OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Event_Start_Date__c )), YEAR(Event_Start_Date__c) <> 2024 ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Event_Year__c )), Event_Year__c <> 2024 ) ) ), AND( CONTAINS( Name , "2025"), OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Event_Start_Date__c )), YEAR(Event_Start_Date__c) <> 2025 ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Event_Year__c )), Event_Year__c <> 2025 ) ) ), AND( CONTAINS( Name , "2026"), OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Event_Start_Date__c )), YEAR(Event_Start_Date__c) <> 2026 ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Event_Year__c )), Event_Year__c <> 2026 ) ) ), AND( CONTAINS( Name , "2027"), OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Event_Start_Date__c )), YEAR(Event_Start_Date__c) <> 2027 ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Event_Year__c )), Event_Year__c <> 2027 ) ) ), AND( CONTAINS( Name , "2028"), OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Event_Start_Date__c )), YEAR(Event_Start_Date__c) <> 2028 ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Event_Year__c )), Event_Year__c <> 2028 ) ) ), AND( CONTAINS( Name , "2029"), OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Event_Start_Date__c )), YEAR(Event_Start_Date__c) <> 2029 ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Event_Year__c )), Event_Year__c <> 2029 ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Event Quarter does not match Event Month, or Event Name contains different year than Event Year.
CustomField.label: Date Mismatch 2
